summary:
Just took Frapers port of The Witcher 2 Triss armor and made it craftable at the Skyforge...
I dont like having armors i have to use the console to get.. So i made it so you can craft the armor in the Leather section on the Skyforge.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=green]I'm taking a break from modding Skyrim to enjoy playing it and other real life issues. I may be back later to pick up work on my mods again.[/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=10][color=blue]Craftable Triss Light Armor V1.0[/size][/color][/center]

[CENTER][u]by Tyco1709/Original mod by Fraper[/u][/CENTER]

[center][img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/4617/descriptionk.png[/img][/center]
Just took Frapers port of The Witcher 2 Triss armor and made it craftable at the Skyforge...
I dont like having armors i have to use the console to get.. So i made it so you can craft the armor in the Leather section on the Skyforge. 

To craft each item it requires.

[u]Body.[/u]
Leather - 10
Leather Strips - 5
Iron Ingot - 1
[u]Boots.[/u]
Leather - 5
Leather Strips - 5
Iron Ingot - 1
[u]Gloves.[/u]
Leather - 5
Leather Strips - 5
Iron Ingots - 1
[u]Hood.[/u]
Leather - 3
Leather Strips - 5
Iron Ingot - 1

Full upgradable.

To upgrade you need.

[u]Body.[/u]
Leather - 2
Leather Strips - 1
[u]Boots.[/u]
Leather - 2
Leather Strips - 1
[u]Gloves.[/u]
Leather - 2
Leather Strips - 1
[u]Hood.[/u]
Leather - 2
Leather Strips - 1


Items included.

Chest.
Boots.
Gloves.
Hood.

*Theres some slight clipping issues. Also the menu models look odd because its the models that go on the player. Will fix this soon as possible.*
[center][img]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/2482/installa.png[/img][/center]
Copy the archive content into your x:\TESV Skyrim\Data folder, when asked overwrite. Activate the esp in NMM (Nexus Mod Manager).

Or

Download with NMM and install it.

[center][img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/9233/uninstall.png[/img][/center]
Just delete the folders Raven in

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data\Meshes\armor

and

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data\textures\armor

And

delete the Craftable Triss armor.esp in the data folder.

[center][img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/5193/todolistl.png[/img][/center]
+ Fix the menu model views.

[center][img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2596/changelog.png[/img][/center]
1.15.2012 - V 1.0 - First release.
2.18.2012 - V2.1 - Fixed boots from not showing up. Made Omod installer.

 
[center][img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/9058/creditsn.png[/img][/center]
Bethesda - Making Skyrim.
Nexus sites - Giving me a place to host and share my mod.
Fraper - Allowing me to use his meshes and textures to make the mod.
Nopheros - Base Omod installer script.
author: Tyco1709
